        private AutoInputGraphType_EmptyInput(AutoInputGraphType_EmptyInput? cloneFrom) : base(cloneFrom)

            if (cloneFrom != null)
            {
                _fields = global::System.Linq.Enumerable.ToArray(cloneFrom.Fields);
                return;

                AddField(fieldType);

                _cache = new AutoInputGraphType_EmptyInput(this);
            }
        }

            if (value is not global::Sample.EmptyInput obj)
                return false;
